    • hasTimeRemaining

      public boolean hasTimeRemaining()
      Checks if there is still time remaining in the current game session.
      Returns:
      true if the remaining time is greater than zero; false otherwise.

    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      Returns whether the game is in a game over state.
      Returns:
      true if the game is over; false otherwise.

    • setGameOver

      public void setGameOver()

    • init

      public final void init(GamePanel gamePanel, InfoPanel infoPanel)
      Initializes the GameManager for a new game. This method must be called before the game can run. It sets up all the necessary objects to start the game.
      Parameters:
      gamePanel - The panel where the game is displayed.
      infoPanel - The panel where the game information is displayed.

    • clear

      public final void clear()
      Clears game data (used when transitioning back to the main menu).

    • onPause

      public void onPause(ActionEvent e)
      Pauses the game when the pause button is clicked. Stops the timer and displays the pause menu dialogue.
      Parameters:
      e - The action event triggered by clicking the pause button.

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame()

      public void update()
      Updates all managed objects and the current game state.
